Notes:

The Naked Gun sequels were never released on blu-ray, but 1080p versions were released for HDTV - which is what you're seeing here. The original The Naked Gun was released on blu-ray, and my 720p encode of it had a blu-ray source, but these three are all the HDTV 1080p's. As far as I can tell, this is only the second torrent to have the sequels in 1080p, and the only one with a decent file size (4gigs as opposed to 13gigs), so please seed generously.

Bitrates listed are variable, using multi-pass encoding for maximum quality, which means the numbers you see are average bitrates.

Please seed as long as possible, preferably until reaching a share ratio of at least 3:1.
